attributes.additional_details: Start negotiations with the EU to rejoin the Customs Union. This is the most effective way to increase UK productivity. Start making the argument to the public in favour of rejoining and potential benefits.
attributes.background: Rejoin the EU customs union to improve UK GDP and productivity.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Apply to re-join the Customs Union" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/754234
